entries.title: Diddy's Lawyer Says Client Won't Take Plea Bargain
entries.summary: Diddy will fight his legal case to the bitter end ... because his lawyer says a plea deal won't fly with his client. Diddy's attorney, Marc Agnifilo, appears in TMZ Studios' new documentary -- "The Downfall of Diddy: The Indictment" -- available to…

entries.title: Is Michelle Obama Meghan Markle's muse? Duchess appears to mirror her fashion choices - but former First Lady might have echoed the royals too
entries.summary: The Duchess of Sussex often sports outfits that appear to be inspired by Michelle Obama.

entries.title: What would a US election victory for Harris or Trump mean for your investments?
entries.summary: Typically, investors can look beyond the fierce politicking, but this time the candidates have sharply divergent plans that could have severe fallout whoever wins.

entries.title: Inside the seedy bathhouse Diddy visited 'three times a week' - as staff reveal his favorite treatment
entries.summary: In the entrance of the Turkish & Russian Bath on East 10th Street hangs a photograph of one very well-known face. Staff say Diddy frequented the bathhouse, visiting multiple times a week.
